ingredients.content: 200 g black rice, soaked overnight then drained and rinsed

preparations.content: Place mango flesh and lime juice in mixing bowl then blend <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.

<b>Insert butterfly whisk<b>. Place rice, coconut milk, water, salt and vanilla pod in mixing bowl then cook <b>25 min/90°C//speed 1<b>. Replace measuring cup with simmering basket then cook again <b>10 min/Varoma//speed 1<b>.
Add maple syrup and stir <b>5 sec//speed 1<b>. Top with reserved fruit purée, squeeze half a passion fruit over each bowl then serve.
